description: Currently, the floating-ips-create-resp.json is used as the request sample for Add (Associate) Floating Ip (Addfloatingip Action) in the servers-actions.inc file. According to TODO, a new request sample file must be created for this action.
title: Need to create the sample file for Add Floating IP request action.

comments.content: Currently, the floating-ips-create-resp.json is used as the request sample for Add (Associate) Floating Ip (Addfloatingip Action) in the servers-actions.inc file. According to TODO, a new request sample file must be created for this action.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sharat-sharma

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Michael Still (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/317255
Reason: This patch has been sitting unchanged for more than 12 weeks. I am therefore going to abandon it to keep the nova review queue sane. Please feel free to restore the change if you're still working on it.

comments.content: For TODO's I don't think we need to report a bug, we can directly submit a patch for that change to Gerrit. Anyhow this TODO has been addressed already in the current master. So marking this bug as Invalid.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~anusha-unnam
